desc: Don’t settle for less than what your surgical practice demands. Karl Schumacher offers premium surgical instruments and consumables – all online, direct to you – making it easier than ever to shop on your own terms, anywhere, anytime. Shop simply and practice confidently with Karl Schumacher.
